resources.string:
Enter user ID:
 – http://steamcommunity.com/id/XXX
 – http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/XXX
 – STEAM_X:X:XXXXXXXX
 – X:X:XXXXXXXX

The app needs to download the files for all TF2 items.

The total download size is ~4 MB. It is recommended that you are on a wifi connection

Do you want to download the files?
The download failed with the following error:
A unknown item was found. This could be because of the game files being outdated.\n\nDo you want to update the game files now?

• 2.2.0 – 2018–10–07:
 – Fixed usage of deprecated Web Api.
 – Fixed searching for users not working.
 – Added so that backpack data can be cached locally.
 – Reworked Schema download to be less intrusive by downloading images when they are needed instead of directly.
 – Added large item image on item info dialog.

• 2.1.2 – 2017–10–07:
 – Fixed crash when downloading images

• 2.1.1 – 2014–02–24:
 – Minor fixes

• 2.1.0 – 2013–12–07:
 – Removed ads
 – Fixed not reading strange scores correctly

• 2.0.9 – 2013–10–19:
 – Fixed ads being too big

• 2.0.8 – 2013–07–24:
 – Added full support for Team-Paint in backpack
 – Fixed not showing which items are equipped correctly

• 2.0.7 – 2013–07–22:
 – Fixed duplicate attributes

• 2.0.6 – 2013–06–18:
 – Fixed not showing info message when viewing unknown items

• 2.0.5 – 2013–03–24:
 – Added support for strange parts

• 2.0.4 – 2013–03–18:
 – Added ability to select which backpack page to go to in backpack viewer
 – Fixed backpack not remembering current page on orientation change
 – Fixed more FC situations

• 2.0.3 – 2013–03–15:
 – Fixed FC when rotating backpack (again…)

• 2.0.2 – 2013–03–14:
 – Fixed FC when rotating backpack
 – Better error feedback in backpack

• 2.0.1 – 2013–03–14:
 – Fixed FC when trying to change user

• 2.0 – 2013–03–13:
 – Improved interface for tablets
 – Improved downloading of TF2 files. It now uses a notification and provides more info on what's going on
 – Added support for higher resolution images (experimental)

• 1.6.1 – 2012–11–04:
 – Changed color for Haunted items
 – Fixed friends-list not sorting properly

• 1.6 – 2012–10–29:
 – Possible fix for FC when rotation device
 – Added support for new particle effects
 – Fixed not fully handling ungiven items

• 1.5.9 – 2012–09–10:
 – Fixed FC when multitasking

• 1.5.8 – 2012–08–20:
 – Fixed avatars not loading when searching

• 1.5.7 – 2012–07–30:
 – Fixed FC in friends list
 – Fixed keyboard behaviour when entering user id

• 1.5.6 – 2012–07–22:
 – Fixed FC when viewing friends list

• 1.5.5 – 2012–06–07:
 – Added categories for items list

• 1.5.4 – 2012–05–06:
 – Added craftable status to item info
 – Improved behaviour of username suggestion box

• 1.5.3 – 2012–04–22:
 – Fixed friends-list not working

• 1.5.2 – 2012–04–07:
 – Fixed FC when caching steam id
 – Fixed not fetching player name on "Crafted by" attribute
 – Fixed other small bugs as well

• 1.5.1 – 2012–03–26:
 – Potential fix for FC when starting app

• 1.5 – 2012–03–26:
 – Added steam avatars to friendslist

• 1.4.9 – 2011–12–16:
 – Fixed FC when downloading game files

• 1.4.8 – 2011–10–31:
 – Added support for haunted items
 – Added black background on equipped text
 – Hopefully fixed crashes when downloading gamefiles

• 1.4.7 – 2011–09–29:
 – Added option to reset images when downloading TF2 gamefiles

• 1.4.6 – 2011–09–09:
 – Fixed FC when viewing specific weapons in backpack
 – Fixed the "New" button disappearing on orientation change

• 1.4.5 – 2011–09–04:
 – Updated strange quality items with the new color
 – Bugfixes

• 1.4.4 – 2011–08–16:
 – Fixed FC with all items list

• 1.4.3 – 2011–08–11:
 – Fixed a FC when downloading images
 – All items list is now using a lazy loader to make it less laggy

• 1.4.2 – 2011–07–30:
 – Backpack view now scales to take up as much screen as possible
 – Removed "Unknown" rank for strange weapons since it isn't used

• 1.4.1 – 2011–07–27:
 – Added info to community id tutorial on how to set steam profile to public
 – Fixed issue with dialogs

• 1.4.0 – 2011–07–19:
 – Added landscape support to dashboard
 – Added support for new team paint cans
 – Added support for item craft order

• 1.3.9 – 2011–07–17:
 – Fixed color issue with Team Spirit

• 1.3.8 – 2011–07–02:
 – Added support for the "Strange" item quality

• 1.3.7 – 2011–06–25:
 – Fixed various errors

• 1.3.6 – 2011–05–28:
 – Fixed duplicate attributes
 – Item grid list is improved in landscape mode

• 1.3.5 – 2011–05–21:
 – Added item descriptions

• 1.3.4 – 2011–05–16:
 – Fixed paint and unusual effect

• 1.3.3 – 2011–05–15:
 – Added all items list
 – Added function to see items that have dropped but not yet been found
 – Removed Golden Wrench list since it doesn't seem to work anymore
 – Updated to support api changes

• 1.3.2 – 2011–05–07:
 – Because of a crash bug in admob, ads on 1.6 systems are temporarily removed until google fixes it

• 1.3.1 – 2011–05–03:
 –Fixed FC on app install

• 1.3 – 2011–05–02:
 – Added guide on how to set a steam community id

 • 1.2.9 – 2011–03–28:
 – Fixed some dialog issues
 – Fixed ad placement

• 1.2.8 – 2011–03–03:
 – Added search function

• 1.2.7 – 2011–02–16:
 – Added support for the "Genuine" item quality

• 1.2.6 – 2011–01–21:
 – Added support for regular steam id's (STEAM_X:Y:Z)

• 1.2.5 – 2011–01–19:
 – Now shows particle effect
 – Now colors the backpack cell according to item quality ( can be turned off in settings )

• 1.2.2 – 2011–01–16:
 – Fixed paint can icons
 – Improved item list download speed

• 1.2.1 – 2011–01–03:
 – Fixed custom descriptions showing as names

• 1.2 – 2010–12–31:
 – Shows item descriptions ( no attributes yet )
 – Shows custom item names and descriptions
 – Now shows items painted with team spirit
 – Now shows equipped status
 – Now shows tradable status
 – Fixed backpack size issue on orientation change

• 1.1.6 – 2010–12–20:
 – Added support for an unlimited number of backpack pages

• 1.1.5 – 2010–12–18:
 – Added support for colored items
 – Added support for six backpack pages

• 1.1.2 – 2010–11–16:
 – Fixed FC when trying to get user id

• 1.1.1 – 2010–11–14:
 – Fixed a crash in friends–list if you had less then 10 friends

• 1.1 – 2010–11–07:
 – News list improved
 – Player list uses slow adapter now to prevent lots of running threads
 – Better error handling

• 1.0.5 – 2010–11–02:
 – Added better feedback on network errors
 – Backpack now remebers page number on orientation change

• 1.0.1 – 2010–10–31:
 – Fixed FC on orientation change

• 1.0 – 2010–10–29:
 – First release
Set how many news entries that will be downloaded
Steam API seems to be down. Try again later
( Not Tradable, Not Usable in Crafting )
The backpack cell will be colored with the item quality color
Backpack will be shown as normal

To set a community id that can be used in this application you must first go to the steam communty website and login.

1. Go to "Edit my profile"

2. Go to where it says "Custom URL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/"

3. Enter in the textbox the id you would like to use and then click save

If your backpack is private, do the following:

1. Go to "Edit my profile"

2. Click on the "Settings" tab

3. Change your profile status to "Public" and click save
Numbers above 100 will not be shown – just like ingame
Craft order number will always be shown if it exists
Clears all cache files the app has downloaded
Are you sure you want to do this?
Downloading player list. This could take a while

The app has been updated with new features. In order for them to work the TF2 files needs to be updated.

The total download size is ~2 MB (excluding images). It is recommended that you are on a wifi connection

Do you want to download the files?
The TF2 game files needs to be updated. Go to: Settings -> Refresh TF2 Game Files
If you like the app you can donate!
